dialogue.text: You know nobody would hold it against you if you were to ever fuck your sister, right?
Are you saying that because you actually believe it? Or because you just want someone to say the same thing about you and {i}your{/i} sister?
I wouldn’t blame either one of you for nailing your sisters. They’re both hot as Hell and it’s not like you run the risk of inbreeding.
Bad move. Kirin’s been waiting for someone to validate her fantasy of being fucked by her sister for years now and you’ve just opened the floodgates.
I do not want my sister to {i}fuck{/i} me, you two.
I want to fuck {i}her.{/i} It’s different.
Oh dayum. She ain’t even hidin’ it.
Just with you two. Don’t tell anybody else.
Am I...one of the girls now?
You’re certainly a special kind of person, Kirin.
Oh, please. Like you’ve never masturbated with your sister’s hairbrush before.
Niki’s hairbrush was way too big for that sort of thing. I used a marker, like a real {i}distinguished{/i} lady.
No wonder she’s head over heels for Sensei. Girl spent her whole life with an XXL hair brush preparing herself for his giant dick.
Uhh...hi. Teacher here.
I thought you were one of the girls?
I was until you started talking about Senpai’s penis. Now I’m just a very unqualified detective.
Oh, I haven’t seen it. Sensei’s a totally respectable adult who only has sex with other adult women. But, let’s be real, we all know he’s packing.
As your teacher, I’m going to have to ask you to stop saying things like that.
But, as one of the girls, you right. He packin’.
But wait, what does Noriko’s sister’s hair brush have to do with Senpai?
They dated for years. And if we’re all gonna keep pretending he never tapped that, we might as well check ourselves into a mental institution because that’s just insane.
Shh! Chika doesn’t know yet! And for the record, I have confirmation from both sources that they never made it that far.
Fine. Whatever. But she’s still probably swallowed more of his jizz than there is water in our bodies.
He...dated {i}her?{/i} That mega-babe on a sparkly stage, singing in front of thousands of people?! Ain’t she a little young?!
She’s almost 30.
Why are there so many hot girls around here who look way younger than they actually are?!
And how the fuck are we supposed to compete with an idol?! The hell, Senpai?!
{i}Compete?{/i}
Are you gunning for Sensei’s affection as well, Imani?
Um...
Nooooo?...
Convincing.
No wonder you’ve never accepted any of my advances. You’ve already fallen for the same guy literally everyone else has fallen for.
You know, your ability to just deny the truth and make up your own version of shit instead is really something to be marveled at.
If you don’t mind me asking...what’s been holding you back?
You guys work together...you get along really well...and you’re straight up so beautiful that it makes literally everyone in class jealous.
Realistically speaking, you’d have a much better chance than any one of us, don’t you think?
Romance is...
Well, first and foremost, it’s not a thing I should be discussing with a bunch of teens. Especially teens who are in regular contact with the subject of said romance.
It’s just...not a thing I’m really {i}good{/i} at. And it’s not a thing Senpai seems particularly interested in to begin with, so...
Not to mention there ain’t a single person in class who would endorse it even if, by some stretch of imagination, things {i}did{/i} go somewhere other than the friend route.
I’d endorse it. And watch it repeatedly if it was on film. That sounds hot.
You’re barely a human. You don’t count.
N-
Nodoka too. She’s even {i}less{/i} human. But you’ve been laying it on a lot harder than she has, yo.
Why does it matter if we endorse it? You should always follow your heart...even if it means putting the people you care about at risk.
Guys, I’m glad that I’m apparently young and cool enough to talk to about this...but I really shouldn’t be getting into it right now.
It’s Christmas. We should be hanging out and watching Hot Noriko’s concert. Not discussing why I should be gunning for my senpai’s heart.
At the end of the day, we’re good friends who work together....and that’s how shit’s going to stay for the indefinite future.
Or at least until we get really, {i}really{/i} drunk one night and wind up sleeping together and taking shit from there like all {i}real{/i} adults do.
But until that happens, I’m just Imani Imai — the hot, fun student teacher who {i}isn’t{/i} boning the other teacher. Even if he {i}is{/i} packing. The end.
If that’s what makes you happy, Imani...
Hmm...
You know what would make {i}me{/i} happy?
Literally anyone boning Senpai and you getting to watch and/or participate?
Well...
You haven’t exactly been all that reserved about it, Kirin.
What if I was going to say...something like, “Spending the whole Christmas party hanging out with the two of you?”
While we take turns with Sensei.
There it is.
Hope your Secret Santa gift this year is a chastity belt. You need it.
I’M LATE, I’M LATE, I’M LATE! HOW DID YOU LET THIS HAPPEN?!
Why is it suddenly my fault that you’re irresponsible when it comes to time?
My plans for the day didn’t factor in falling unconscious from spending too long in the sauna!
I assume they didn’t factor in the hour you had to spend in the bath afterward as well?
I was all sweaty and gross! And so were you! It was a necessary evil!
But an entire {i}hour?{/i}
MOVE OVER! NIKI’S NUMBER ONE FAN COMING THROUGH!
HA! Funny joke, Ami! A real number one fan would have cleared her entire schedule to be here from the start!
Things happened! Things beyond my control! There wasn’t anything I could do!
Likely story! Now, shut the fuck up! The queen is about to speak!
You guys have no idea how glad I am to see you.
First, ya disappear all night...Then, ya disappear all day...If I didn’t know any better, I’d say you were gettin’ dragged along on special event chains, Sensei.
Did you have fun with Ami, at least? She seemed pretty excited to enact her revengeful “Hang out with me all day” plan this morning.
I’m not sure if “fun” is the word I’d use. But it was definitely a time nonetheless.
What have you guys been up to? Anything interesting happen while I was gone?
Not...particularly...It was...a pretty normal day...
We just...hung around and...played games and stuff...
No unexpected run-ins today?
Hm?...No...Why would-
Ah...
Sana? What’s up? You look really flushed all of a sudden.
Yo! Stop shakin’ the Switch or I ain’t ever gettin’ my chicken dinner!
Did something happen with you two? The only time I’ve ever seen Sana with that expression is the time I-
Ah!
No way...
{i}Sana.{/i}
You {i}didn’t.{/i}
Didn’t what? The heck’s goin’ on over here? And how come Sana looks like she just got caught with her pants-
I’m leaving and I’m taking my Switch!
Ay! I wasn’t done with that, ya friggin’ thief!
IT’S MINE!
You, uhh...didn’t by any chance...see something you weren’t supposed to...right? Because she still hasn’t lived down when I-
I didn’t see anything.
Then why is-
Hey, ask her. I’m not trying to get anybody in trouble. I just wanted to make sure her day was going smoothly.
By...casually letting {i}her{/i} know that...{i}you{/i} know something...you shouldn’t?

All I did was ask a simple question. Sana is the one who interpreted it that way. And if that means accidentally teaching her a lesson about her role as the one who should always be innocent, so be it.
Sensei...she’s a normal girl like the rest of us. Of course she’s going to-
Don’t say it. I don’t want to hear it.
Sensei...you get out there...and you get me that chicken. You got it?
No, Miku. I have literally no idea what that means. And put your hands down. The game thing has been gone for a full minute.
It’s only gone because {i}you let it walk away.{/i}
That’s not what-
Uhh...Sensei?
Rin? What’s up?
Heeeey...soo...
I am kind of like, thirty...maybe {i}fifteen{/i} seconds away from having a nervous breakdown right now?
So if you have a few minutes to listen to me yell a whole bunch of reasons you shouldn’t hate me sprinkled with even more that contradict that...uhh...could you maybe follow me into the hallway?
Yeah. I just-
Go. I’ll make sure no one else leaves the room so you guys can be alone. Not like they {i}would{/i} when Niki is playing anyway, but still.
Thank you, Ayane. I’ll make it-
Thank me later. Deal with this first.
Yeah...Yeah, right.
I lead the way into the hall and Rin follows closely behind, taking a deep breath once we move through the doors and the music of a girl I once [[probably] loved fades into nothing.
Her breathing is irregular and panicked and it’s clear that she has some sort of bad news to deliver to me...
But considering the fact that there were no confessions this year and Otoha isn’t even here to help create any more problems, I’m not really sure what it could be.
It’s probably not depression acting up either but, then again, I’ve never really been present when Rin slips {i}into{/i} one of her episodes and-
Sensei...
Yeah...my bad. Lost in thought.
Yeah! That’s cool. Cool cool cool cool cool cool. Uhh...........okay. Yeah. Words. I can do words. Rin is good at words.
Fuck. Shit. Umm...
Right! So...

You...You know how we were kind of best friends for a while? Or at least really good friends who you wouldn’t specifically {i}call{/i} best friends because that’s not really a...thing that registers to...uhh...
So, anyway! You know how friends know stuff about each other? Like how you knew about my crush on Chika before anybody else? Or how I’m adopted? Stuff like that?
Yeah...do you have a {i}new{/i} secret for me?
Uhhhhhhhhh..........not exactly.

But if it makes things any better, which it probably won’t because anyone with half a brain would leave me out here in the hall to melt into a puddle of gooey, red pulp, I’ll tell you anything you want!
Anything you want to know! Anything at all! Because if there’s anything you’ve been wondering-
Are you stalling right now?
Yes! But I can’t help it because I’m scared that this will finally put an end to our relationship since you’re {i}already{/i} on the fence about me and I wouldn’t be able to take that!
I’m not “on the fence,” Rin. I’m-
Yes you are! You’ve already called me out for focusing too much on Otoha and avoiding you and even if that’s not what I was trying to do, it’s what happened!
But that doesn’t mean I’m planning on just dropping you. I have no reason to do that.

Well, you sure as shit do now! Because this isn’t another one of Rin Rokuhara’s many minor infractions! This is a big fucking deal that could ruin {i}everything{/i} if it gets out. And I mean {i}everything.{/i}
Calm down...take a deep breath.
How?! You told me to stop stalling and that would count as stalling! Should I stall or not stall?! Help me!
Rin-
I told Otoha about you and Chika!
What?

It was an accident, I swear! It just slipped out! And I made her promise not to tell anybody and I trust her but nobody is ever 100%% trustworthy, you know?! Like...what if {i}she{/i} slips next? Then someone {i}else?{/i}
Well...that certainly explains why she was acting differently toward me during the Dorm Wars.
I’m so sorry. I’m so so so sorry. I know how important it is for you to keep all of this stuff under wraps but here I am unwrapping everything like it’s-
Ha! Christmas! It {i}is{/i} Christmas! Oh, how fucking funny is that?!
And {i}then{/i} there’s Chika! Who’s so in love with you and it’s so adorable and she’s saying all these things about how happy she is and how important it is that no one finds out!
And that just makes me even more scared of what the fuck is going to happen if people do!
What if {i}she{/i} loses everything important to her?! And then {i}you{/i} lose {i}everything{/i} in general!

Not to mention poor Futaba who’s wrapped up in all of this too! What’ll happen when I fuck up and let {i}that{/i} slip as well, Sensei?! Why did you keep me around for so long?! I know too much! It’s not safe!
It’s okay...
No, it’s not! Everyone I love is about to get hurt and it’s all because of me and I was too caught up in worrying about when Otoha is going to fuck me to even think about it!
I love you! I love Chika! And I’m sorry I couldn’t keep it a secret like you wanted me to and I understand if that makes you hate me, but I couldn’t hold it in anymore!
Otoha hasn’t told anyone yet, has she?
Oh, god! Are you going to {i}kill{/i} her?
What? No. Why would you even say something like that?
I don’t know! Your life is at stake! People do crazy things when they’re cornered!
Rin, I {i}like{/i} Otoha. And even if she’s a bitch to me sometimes, I can talk to her. It’s not the end of the world if she knows.
It just means I have to...figure out a way to make her not {i}want{/i} to tell anyone.
What...
What does...that mean?
I don’t know. But that’s for me to figure out. You’ve done all you can by just telling me.
Sensei...I know this probably isn’t the right time to do this and that I’m literally insane for suggesting you do {i}anything{/i} after openly putting your whole fucking life at risk...
But I really really really really really think you should stop seeing Futaba. If you cut things off now, Chika might never find out. Because Nodoka knows about that too and...and...
And Futaba doesn’t love you the way Chika does. It’s totally different.
To Chika, you’re like...her whole life. It’s you and her sister. She {i}needs{/i} you. Futaba will be hurt, sure...but...I don’t think you understand just how bad it would be the other way around.
Thanks for the suggestion, Rin. But that’s not really something I want to talk about with you.
I understand...of course you wouldn’t want to tell me anything important after all that...
But I really..{i}really...{/i}really really really really really {i}am{/i} sorry.

You are...so...{i}so{/i} important to me in so many ways that even {i}I{/i} don’t understand. But I guess that doesn’t mean much when I don’t understand {i}myself{/i} enough to even keep a fucking secret.
I just think....
I think you should keep the ones you treasure most...the closest to your heart.
Because when someone like me comes around and sabotages all of that, you’ll-
Huh?...
Can you calm down {i}now?{/i}
What are you doing?...
Why would you hug me at a time like this?...
You should be telling me I’m too impulsive to be your friend...that you won’t feed me secrets anymore...that I never deserved them in the first place...
So why?...
Why are you holding me?...
I’m heeding your advice.
What?...
I’m keeping the ones I treasure most the closest to my heart.
Homies...forever!
Homies forever...
{i}Rin’s affection has increased to [rin_love]!{/i}
